name: The Kingsport Cases
blurb: A fully procedurally generated horror game set in 19th century Lovecraftian lore. It's the type of fear you can never get used to.

rewards.reward: No Reward

CULT SACRIFICE
==============================

A Backer credit in the in-game credits and on our website plus access to the closed beta.

[EARLY BIRD!] CULT PROSPECT ============================== \r\nThank you for being here early! Get everything in the $20 tier: A digital copy of The Kingsport Cases on launch, a copy of our first game, Borealis, and all previous rewards (Backer credit, closed beta access)

CULT INITIATE
==============================

A digital copy of The Kingsport Cases on launch, a copy of our first game, Borealis, and all previous rewards (Backer credit, closed beta access)

CULTIST
============================== 

A postcard depicting a random piece of The Kingsport Cases concept art signed by the Head Designer and Technical Director, plus all previous rewards (The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access)
============================== 
IMPORTANT: Add $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

CULT LEADER (DIGITAL ONLY) ============================== Digital Soundtrack + The Kingsport Cases prequel short story plus all previous digital rewards (The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access)

CULT LEADER
============================== 

Digital Soundtrack + The Kingsport Cases prequel short story plus all previous rewards (postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access)

============================== IMPORTANT: Add $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

CULT KEEPER (DIGITAL ONLY) ============================== A digital edition of the Making Of art and design book for The Kingsport Cases plus all previous digital rewards (digital soundtrack, short story, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access)

CULT KEEPER\r\n============================== \r\nA digital edition of the Making Of art and design book for The Kingsport Cases plus all previous rewards (digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

OCCULT EXPERT\r\n==============================\r\nAn in-game Kickstarter exclusive add on that turns the Detective\u2019s office into a treasure trove of occult and Outer God relics and mysteries, plus all previous rewards (digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

NECRONOMICON ============================== \r\nAn in-game Kickstarter exclusive add on that transforms the Detective's worn and beaten journal into a creepy relic of the Outer Gods, plus all previous rewards (Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE ASSISTANT ============================== \r\nA physical copy of The Kingsport Cases on launch plus all previous rewards (Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE DETECTIVE ============================== \r\nA physical copy of the soundtrack + 18x24 poster of your choice of concept art plus all previous rewards (The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE WATCHER ============================== \r\nT-shirt + extra digital copy of The Kingsport Cases on launch plus all previous rewards (physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

LESSER GOD ============================== \r\nA physical copy of the Making of The Kingsport Cases art and design book plus all previous rewards (t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

OUTER GOD ============================== \r\nA custom The Kingsport Cases moleskine detective journal of your very own plus all previous rewards (physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE ALMIGHTY, ALL POWERFUL CTHULHU ============================== \r\nAn NPC face modeled after you or a consenting friend or family member (must be 18 or older and can provide written consent and proof of identity). Faces will be included in the making of art and design book in the "100 Faces of Kingsport" section. This plus all previous rewards (custom moleskine journal, physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE KINGSPORT GETAWAY ============================== 
A personalized invite to The Kingsport Cases Launch Party in San Jose, CA where we will provide free food and entertainment (travel and accommodation expenses not included) + your name in the Special Thanks section of the in-game credits and on our website. This plus all previous rewards (custom moleskine journal, physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== 
NPC face model available at this tier only if the limited option has not run out when this tier's pledge is made!
============================== 
IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

UNIVERSITY FOUNDER ============================== \r\nImmortalize yourself! Have your first and last name on a golden plate at our in-game Kingsport University + a Producer credit + Add one extra of any eligible item to your order (poster, t-shirt, moleskine journal, physical copy, digital copy, physical book, physical soundtrack) + Get the final game a WEEK before the public! This plus all previous rewards (launch party invite, special thanks, custom moleskine journal, physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== NPC face model available at this tier only if the limited option has not run out when this tier's pledge is made! ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

MANOR ANCESTOR\r\n============================== \r\nImmortalize yourself! Have a painterly portrait of you in the Kingsport manor house (and your name on a golden plate beneath it!) + a Producer credit + Add THREE extra of any eligible item to your order (poster, t-shirt, moleskine journal, physical copy, digital copy, physical book, physical soundtrack) + Get the final game a WEEK before the public! This plus some previous rewards [does not include University Founder tier]: (launch party invite, special thanks, custom moleskine journal, physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== NPC face model available at this tier only if the limited option has not run out when this tier's pledge is made! ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE FISHERY\r\n============================== \r\nImmortalize yourself! The Fishery by the Shipyard needs a name. Why not yours? Have your name etched into our world AND have a piece of concept art depicting you in front of your in-game Fishery! + a Producer credit + Add FIVE extra of any eligible item to your order (poster, t-shirt, moleskine journal, physical copy, digital copy, physical book, physical soundtrack) + Get the final game a WEEK before the public! This plus some previous rewards [does not include University Founder or Manor Ancestor tier]: (launch party invite, special thanks, custom moleskine journal, physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== NPC face model available at this tier only if the limited option has not run out when this tier's pledge is made! ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

LOVECRAFT'S LAST HOPE FOR HUMANITY\r\n=============================\r\nBe our project's hero, and spearhead the fight for innovation in games. Receive one digital, DRM-Free copy of all Machines in Motion games, DLC, and add-ons commercially released for the rest of your life + You or your organization listed as an official Kingsport Cases sponsor on our website and in the credits and thanked profusely at our launch party + an Executive Producer credit + Add TEN extra of any eligible item to your order (poster, t-shirt, moleskine journal, physical copy, digital copy, physical book, physical soundtrack) + Get the final game a WEEK before the public! All this and the undying, unfaltering gratitude of this game's developers. This plus some previous rewards [does not include University Founder, Manor Ancestor, or Fishery tier]: (launch party invite, special thanks, custom moleskine journal, physical making of book, t-shirt, physical soundtrack, 18x24 poster, The Kingsport Cases physical copy on launch, Kickstarter exclusive in-game journal, Kickstarter exclusive in-game office, digital making of book, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, The Kingsport Cases digital copy on launch x2, Borealis, Backer credit, closed beta access) ============================== NPC face model available at this tier only if the limited option has not run out when this tier's pledge is made! ============================== IMPORTANT: Add $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.
